name: Dédale
description:
In this cooperative game, help the famous architect Daedalus to lock the Minotaur in an inextricable labyrinth.

Daedalus offers 10 original challenges of progressive difficulty. You will have to create a Labyrinth for the Minotaur by placing cards each your turn on the center of the table. The goal of the game is to fulfill the challenge before you ran out of cards.

Dédale is created in partnership with the festival Alchimie du jeu of Toulouse for the 2024 edition whose theme is mythology. A portion of the profits is donated to the festival for each sale of the game.

—description from the publisher
